meanings.definition: A short novel or long short story.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy reading novelettes before bed.
meanings.sent2: She wrote a captivating novelette that kept me hooked until the end.
meanings.sent3: The library had a collection of novelettes that made me chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination soared as she crafted a novelette filled with magic and wonder.
meanings.sent5: The novelette painted vivid pictures in my mind with its descriptive language.

meanings.definition: A work of fiction that is longer than a short story but shorter than a novel.
meanings.sent1: The bookstore had a section dedicated to novelettes.
meanings.sent2: He preferred reading novelettes during his commute.
meanings.sent3: The novelette she wrote had unexpected twists that made me smile.
meanings.sent4: His words in the novelette danced off the page and into my heart.
meanings.sent5: The novelette's characters felt like old friends by the end of the story.
